headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WOLFF, HANNAH MILLER

snippet: WOLFF--Hannah Miller, 102, of Boynton Beach, Florida, died April 7, 2016. Wife of the late Joseph Wolff, sister of Saul, Bernard and George, mother of Linda, Margery and Richard, grandmother of Neil, Danielle and Lara, great-grandmother of Reed. Graveside funeral on Sunday, April 10, 11:00am, Mt. Ararat, Farmingdale, Long Island. 1/3
lead_paragraph: WOLFF--Hannah Miller, 102, of Boynton Beach, Florida, died April 7, 2016. Wife of the late Joseph Wolff, sister of Saul, Bernard and George, mother of Linda, Margery and Richard, grandmother of Neil, Danielle and Lara, great-grandmother of Reed. Graveside funeral on Sunday, April 10, 11:00am, Mt. Ararat, Farmingdale, Long Island. 1/3
